chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall p : positive, iad_conv_inv_0 (iad_conv_aux_1 p) = cpla (N.pos p) 0%N

Premises:
Inductive positive : Set := xI : positive -> positive | xO : positive -> positive | xH : positive For xI: Argument scope is [positive_scope] For xO: Argument scope is [positive_scope]
Notation N.pos := Npos
Inductive N : Set := N0 : N | Npos : positive -> N For Npos: Argument scope is [positive_scope]
iad_conv_aux_1 = fix iad_conv_aux_1 (p : positive) : positive := match p with | (p'~1)%positive => ((iad_conv_aux_1 p')~0~1)%positive | (p'~0)%positive => ((iad_conv_aux_1 p')~0~0)%positive | 1%positive => 1%positive end : positive -> positive Argument scope is [positive_scope]
Inductive ad_couple : Set := cpla : ad -> ad -> ad_couple
iad_conv_inv_0 = fix iad_conv_inv_0 (p : positive) : ad_couple := match p with | (p'~1~1)%positive => match iad_conv_inv_0 p' with | cpla 0%N 0%N => cpla 1%N 1%N | cpla 0%N (N.pos p1) => cpla 1%N (N.pos p1~1) | cpla (N.pos p1) 0%N => cpla (N.pos p1~1) 1%N | cpla (N.pos p1) (N.pos p2) => cpla (N.pos p1~1) (N.pos p2~1) end | (p'~0~1)%positive => match iad_conv_inv_0 p' with | cpla 0%N 
iad_inv_0 : forall p : positive, iad_conv_inv_0 (iad_conv_aux_0 p) = cpla 0%N (N.pos p)
N.pos_pred_spec : forall p : positive, Pos.pred_N p = N.pred (N.pos p)
positive_N_Z : forall p : positive, Z.of_N (N.pos p) = Z.pos p
N2Z.inj_pos : forall p : positive, Z.of_N (N.pos p) = Z.pos p
positive_N_nat : forall p : positive, N.to_nat (N.pos p) = Pos.to_nat p
iad_conv_inv = fun a : ad => match a with | 0%N => cpla 0%N 0%N | N.pos p => iad_conv_inv_0 p end : ad -> ad_couple
Pos.pred_N_succ : forall p : positive, Pos.pred_N (Pos.succ p) = N.pos p
positive_nat_N : forall p : positive, N.of_nat (Pos.to_nat p) = N.pos p
Zabs2N.inj_pos : forall p : positive, Z.abs_N (Z.pos p) = N.pos p
N.succ_pos_pred : forall p : positive, N.succ (Pos.pred_N p) = N.pos p
Zabs2N.inj_neg : forall p : positive, Z.abs_N (Z.neg p) = N.pos p
Pos.pred_double_succ : forall p : positive, Pos.pred_double (Pos.succ p) = (p~1)%positive
Pos.succ_pred_double : forall p : positive, Pos.succ (Pos.pred_double p) = (p~0)%positive
Pshiftl_nat_N : forall (p : positive) (n : nat), N.pos (Pos.shiftl_nat p n) = N.shiftl_nat (N.pos p) n
mpl_compat_5 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list) (p : positive), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list (N.pos p~0) pl) -> mpl_compat s0 (M1 prec_list (N.pos p) pl)
mpl_compat_6 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list) (p : positive), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list (N.pos p~1) pl) -> mpl_compat s1 (M1 prec_list (N.pos p) pl)
N_rec : forall P : N -> Set, P 0%N -> (forall p : positive, P (N.pos p)) -> forall n : N, P n
N_rect : forall P : N -> Type, P 0%N -> (forall p : positive, P (N.pos p)) -> forall n : N, P n
N_sind : forall P : N -> SProp, P 0%N -> (forall p : positive, P (N.pos p)) -> forall n : N, P n
N_ind : forall P : N -> Prop, P 0%N -> (forall p : positive, P (N.pos p)) -> forall n : N, P n
Z.pos_sub_spec : forall p q : positive, Z.pos_sub p q = match (p ?= q)%positive with | Eq => 0%Z | Lt => Z.neg (q - p) | Gt => Z.pos (p - q) end
shift_pos_equiv : forall n p : positive, shift_pos n p = Pos.shiftl p (N.pos n)
BinNatDef.N.succ = fun n : N => match n with | 0%N => 1%N | N.pos p => N.pos (Pos.succ p) end : N -> N Argument scope is [N_scope]
Ring_polynom.local_mkpow_ok : forall (R : Type) (rI : R) (rmul : R -> R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> forall (Cpow : Type) (Cp_phi : N -> Cpow) (rpow : R -> Cpow -> R), power_theory rI rmul req Cp_phi rpow -> forall (r : R) (p : positive), req match p with | 1%positive => r | _ => rpow r (Cp_phi (N.pos p)) end (pow_pos rmul r p)
iad_conv = fun a0 a1 : ad => match a0 with | 0%N => match a1 with | 0%N => 0%N | N.pos p1 => N.pos (iad_conv_aux_0 p1) end | N.pos p0 => match a1 with | 0%N => N.pos (iad_conv_aux_1 p0) | N.pos p1 => N.pos (iad_conv_aux_2 p0 p1) end end : ad -> ad -> ad
BinPosDef.Pos.pred_N = fun x : positive => match x with | (p~1)%positive => N.pos p~0 | (p~0)%positive => N.pos (BinPosDef.Pos.pred_double p) | 1%positive => 0%N end : positive -> N Argument scope is [positive_scope]
BinIntDef.Z.testbit = fun a n : Z => match n with | 0%Z => BinIntDef.Z.odd a | Z.pos p => match a with | 0%Z => false | Z.pos a0 => Pos.testbit a0 (N.pos p) | Z.neg a0 => negb (N.testbit (Pos.pred_N a0) (N.pos p)) end | Z.neg _ => false end : Z -> Z -> bool Argument scopes are [Z_scope Z_scope]
Inductive ad_couple : Set := cpla : ad -> ad -> ad_couple
positive_ind : forall P : positive -> Prop, (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~1)%positive) -> (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~0)%positive) -> P 1%positive -> forall p : positive, P p
positive_rect : forall P : positive -> Type, (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~1)%positive) -> (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~0)%positive) -> P 1%positive -> forall p : positive, P p

```coq
unfold iad_conv_inv_0. fold iad_conv_inv_0.
apply N_rec.
- intros. apply N.pos_pred_spec.
- intros. destruct p.
++ simpl. unfold iad_conv_inv_0. fold iad_conv_inv_0.
    rewrite <- Pos.pred_N_succ. apply cpla.
++ simpl. unfold iad_conv_inv_0. fold iad_conv_inv_0.
    rewrite <- Pos.pred_double_succ. apply cpla.
++ simpl. unfold iad_conv_inv_0. fold iad_conv_inv_0.
    rewrite <- Pos.succ_pred_double. apply cpla.
Qed.```
